rundown: 12-1 W @ Miami Marlins Joey Wentz: 6.2 innings, 1 earned run, 4 hits, 0 HR, 5 strikeouts Batters: Ozzie Albies (2 hits - 4 AB, 1 HR, 5 RBI) Jurickson Profar (2 hits - 4 AB, 2 HR, 2 RBI) Michael Harris II (2 hits - 4 AB, 1 HR, 3 RBI) The Braves secured a dominant victory over the Miami Marlins, showcasing their offensive power and solid pitching. Key highlights include Ozzie Albies driving in five runs with a home run, Jurickson Profar hitting two home runs and scoring four times, and Michael Harris II contributing significantly with a home run and three RBIs. Joey Wentz delivered an impressive performance on the mound, allowing only one earned run over 6.2 innings.
